contactCustomerNumberAvailabilityCheck.notes: Without customerNumber, endpoint can return HTTP 500 although spec marks it optional.

getContactTabsItemCountById.notes: Actual payload is wrapped in data.objects while spec shows direct fields.

partGetStock.notes: objects is returned as numeric string instead of integer.

invoiceGetPdf.notes: Response is wrapped in data.objects instead of top-level document fields.

orderGetPdf.notes: Response is wrapped in data.objects instead of top-level document fields.

getLetterpapersWithThumb.notes: Response is wrapped in data.objects instead of result/letterpapers top-level fields.

getTemplates.notes: Response is wrapped in data.objects instead of result/templates top-level fields.

forAccountNumber.notes: objects can be object instead of expected array.
